segments.text: Could you give us a detailed description of the properties of your product ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . The X2500 has the unique feature of providing better data flow with less input time . It will reduce your work load at the office .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you tell me more about it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . One of the real pluses of this product is that it is of very high quality , and of compact size . No one can match us so far as quality is concerned .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you introduce its price level to me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have this item in three price level .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We need the best possible quality .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see , that's what I will order .
segments.speaker: S1
